pages.text: $(#e2a3ff)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/texture-packs/ore-variants)Ore Variants$()$(br2)While the new ore textures in 1.17 are a hit or miss for many people, a miss for myself at one point, I genuinely enjoy this pack. It adds many variations of the ores, so not every block is going to be the same as the one next to it.
